name: mybibliotecha
description: MyBibliotheca is a self-hosted book collection manager. It provides tagging, metadata editing, and search features to organize large book libraries with a simple web UI.
features: Book Cataloging: Organize personal book collections with detailed metadata, covers, and custom categorization systems.
Advanced Search: Find books quickly using title, author, genre, tags, or custom metadata with powerful filtering options.
Metadata Editing: Modify book information, add custom tags, and update details through an intuitive web interface.
Cover Management: Upload and manage book cover images with automatic resizing and optimization features.
Tag System: Create custom tags and categories to organize books by genre, reading status, or personal preferences.
Reading Lists: Build and manage reading lists, wishlists, and custom collections for better library organization.
Import Tools: Bulk import book data from CSV files, ISBN lookups, or other library management systems.
Web Interface: Access your library from any device through a clean, responsive web-based interface.
Backup Export: Export library data in multiple formats for backup purposes or migration to other systems.
Multi-user Support: Share libraries with family members while maintaining individual reading lists and preferences.
Statistics Dashboard: View reading statistics, collection insights, and progress tracking with visual charts.
Mobile Friendly: Browse and manage your book collection seamlessly on smartphones and tablets.
